dcterms:description: A classical benchmark dataset for relation extraction task which consists of 19 relation types, with 7199/800/1864 relation mentions in training/validation/test sets, respectively.
dcterms:title: SemEval

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
M. Cisse
Y. N. Dauphin
D. Lopez-Paz
dcterms:description: A large-scale crowd-source relation extraction benchmark dataset which is collected from all the prior TAC KBP shared tasks.
dcterms:title: TACRED

dcterms:creator: C. Alt
A. Gabryszak
L. Hennig
dcterms:description: A revisited dataset of TACRED that found about 6.62% noisily-labeled relation mentions and relabeled the validation and test set.
dcterms:title: TACREV
